trees.name: Actuator Systems
trees.description: Research tree for Actuator Systems

tiers.name: Basic Electric Motors
tiers.description: Simple electric motors provide basic mechanical actuation for probe manipulators and construction systems.

tiers.name: Servo Motors
tiers.description: Precision servo motors enable fine control and positioning for delicate operations.

tiers.name: Hydraulic Actuators
tiers.description: High-force hydraulic actuators provide powerful linear motion for heavy construction tasks.

tiers.name: Pneumatic Actuators
tiers.description: Fast-response pneumatic actuators enable rapid movement and positioning.

tiers.name: Shape Memory Alloys
tiers.description: Materials that change shape with temperature allow compact, self-actuating mechanisms.

tiers.name: Piezoelectric Actuators
tiers.description: Piezoelectric materials provide nanometer-scale precision for ultra-fine manipulation.

tiers.name: Electrostatic Actuators
tiers.description: Electrostatic forces enable frictionless, high-speed actuation in vacuum environments.

tiers.name: Magnetic Actuators
tiers.description: Magnetic field manipulation provides contactless actuation with high efficiency.

tiers.name: Quantum Actuators
tiers.description: Quantum effects enable actuators that operate at fundamental physical limits.

tiers.name: Spacetime Actuators
tiers.description: Direct manipulation of spacetime curvature provides instantaneous actuation without mechanical components.

trees.name: Dyson Swarm Construction
trees.description: Research focused on optimizing Dyson sphere/swarm construction rates and efficiency.

tiers.name: Multi-Body Agent Coordination Schemas
tiers.description: Coordination protocols enable multiple probes to work together efficiently on large-scale construction projects.

tiers.name: Large-Scale Deployment Patterns
tiers.description: Optimized deployment strategies maximize construction rates for massive orbital structures.

tiers.name: Modular Articulated Structures
tiers.description: Modular design allows rapid assembly of complex structures from standardized components.

tiers.name: Kessler-Enhanced Chaotic Dynamic Control
tiers.description: Advanced orbital mechanics control prevents collisions and optimizes swarm trajectories.

tiers.name: Perturbative Swarm Solutions
tiers.description: Mathematical optimization of swarm dynamics maximizes construction efficiency.

tiers.name: De-Localized Intelligence Cloud
tiers.description: Distributed intelligence across the swarm enables autonomous coordination without central control.

tiers.name: Thin-Plasma Communications Relays
tiers.description: Plasma-based communication enables instant coordination across vast distances.

tiers.name: Quantum Entangled Swarm Coordination
tiers.description: Quantum entanglement provides perfect synchronization across the entire construction swarm.

tiers.name: Autonomous Self-Replication Protocols
tiers.description: Self-replicating construction units exponentially accelerate Dyson sphere assembly.

tiers.name: Retro-Causal Probability Field
tiers.description: Causality manipulation allows construction to occur before planning, achieving perfect efficiency.

trees.name: Locomotion Systems
trees.description: Research improving fine movement and positioning systems reduces energy costs for building and mining.

tiers.name: Cold Gas Thrusters
tiers.description: Simple compressed gas thrusters provide basic attitude control and fine positioning.

tiers.name: Hall Effect Thrusters
tiers.description: Hall effect thrusters offer efficient ion propulsion for extended maneuvering operations.

tiers.name: Heavy Ion Thrusters
tiers.description: Heavy ion propulsion provides high thrust-to-power ratios for rapid repositioning.

tiers.name: Plasma RF Thrusters
tiers.description: Radio frequency plasma thrusters enable efficient, high-power propulsion.

tiers.name: EM Drive Momentum Conserver
tiers.description: Electromagnetic drive systems conserve momentum while providing continuous thrust.

tiers.name: Quantized Inertial Capacitor Bank
tiers.description: Quantum inertial storage allows instantaneous momentum transfer without propellant.

tiers.name: Casimir Microstructure Surface Array
tiers.description: Casimir effect manipulation provides propellantless propulsion through vacuum energy.

tiers.name: Unruh Horizon Higgs Attractor
tiers.description: Unruh radiation manipulation enables movement through spacetime curvature.

tiers.name: Mach Effect Inertial Frame Torquer
tiers.description: Mach effect allows inertial frame manipulation for reactionless propulsion.

tiers.name: Universe Frame Shifting
tiers.description: Direct manipulation of the universal reference frame enables instantaneous translation without movement.

trees.name: Materials Science
trees.description: Research tree for Materials Science

tiers.name: Basic Alloys
tiers.description: Standard metal alloys provide improved strength and durability for construction materials.

tiers.name: High-Strength Steel
tiers.description: Advanced steel alloys offer exceptional strength-to-weight ratios for structural components.

tiers.name: Titanium Alloys
tiers.description: Titanium alloys provide excellent corrosion resistance and high temperature performance.

tiers.name: Carbon Composites
tiers.description: Carbon fiber composites offer extreme strength with minimal mass for lightweight structures.

tiers.name: Nanomaterials
tiers.description: Nanoscale materials exhibit unique properties enabling ultra-strong, self-healing structures.

tiers.name: Metamaterials
tiers.description: Engineered metamaterials provide properties not found in nature, including negative indices.

tiers.name: Single-Crystal Structures
tiers.description: Perfect single-crystal materials eliminate defects, achieving theoretical strength limits.

tiers.name: Quantum Materials
tiers.description: Materials with quantum properties enable structures that exist in superposition states.

tiers.name: Exotic Matter Composites
tiers.description: Exotic matter integration provides materials with negative mass and other impossible properties.

tiers.name: Perfect Crystals
tiers.description: Perfect crystalline structures achieve absolute theoretical limits of material properties.

trees.name: Production Efficiency
trees.description: Research improving manufacturing rates, material efficiency, and production quality.

tiers.name: Standard Design Patterns
tiers.description: Standardized design patterns reduce manufacturing complexity and improve production rates.

tiers.name: Adaptive Learning Controllers
tiers.description: Machine learning controllers optimize manufacturing processes in real-time.

tiers.name: In-Situ Resource Hybridization
tiers.description: Direct use of raw materials eliminates processing steps, accelerating production.

tiers.name: Stamp Forging
tiers.description: High-speed stamp forging enables rapid mass production of standardized components.

tiers.name: Additive Laser Manufacturing
tiers.description: Laser-based 3D printing allows complex geometries to be built layer by layer.

tiers.name: Single-Crystal Blown Nickel Forgings
tiers.description: Advanced forging techniques produce perfect single-crystal structures.

tiers.name: Carbon Alloy Composite
tiers.description: Composite materials combine the best properties of multiple materials.

tiers.name: Isoline Grid Aesthetics
tiers.description: Mathematical optimization of material distribution maximizes structural efficiency.

tiers.name: Molecular Assembly Manufacturing
tiers.description: Molecular-scale assembly enables construction at the atomic level.

tiers.name: Quantum Coherent Material Synthesis
tiers.description: Quantum coherence allows materials to be assembled in superposition states, achieving perfect efficiency.

trees.name: Propulsion Systems
trees.description: Research improving propulsion efficiency reduces energy costs for orbital access, building, and resource collection.

tiers.name: Hydrazine Rockets
tiers.description: Simple hydrazine monopropellant rockets provide reliable propulsion for orbital maneuvers.

tiers.name: Hydrogen Rockets
tiers.description: Liquid hydrogen rockets offer high specific impulse for efficient long-duration burns.

tiers.name: Methalox Rockets
tiers.description: Methane-oxygen rockets provide excellent performance with simpler handling than hydrogen.

tiers.name: Vacuum-Rated Nozzles
tiers.description: Optimized vacuum nozzles maximize exhaust velocity and thrust efficiency in space.

tiers.name: Thermal Fission Drive
tiers.description: Nuclear thermal rockets use fission heat to accelerate propellant, providing high thrust.

tiers.name: FRC Fusion Drive
tiers.description: Field-reversed configuration fusion drives offer high efficiency and continuous operation.

tiers.name: Magnetic Mirror Fusion Drive
tiers.description: Magnetic mirror confinement enables stable fusion reactions for propulsion.

tiers.name: Electrostatic Inertial Confinement Fusion Drive
tiers.description: Electrostatic inertial confinement achieves fusion ignition without magnetic fields.

tiers.name: Antimatter-Matter Drive
tiers.description: Antimatter annihilation provides the highest energy density possible for propulsion.

tiers.name: Magnetohydrodynamic Inertial Mass Reduction Drive
tiers.description: MHD mass reduction allows effective mass to approach zero, enabling near-infinite acceleration.

trees.name: Resource Recovery & Salvage Operations
trees.description: Research improving recycling efficiency and material recovery from dismantled structures.

tiers.name: Basic Salvage Protocols
tiers.description: Standard disassembly procedures recover materials from decommissioned structures.

tiers.name: Precision Disassembly Techniques
tiers.description: Careful disassembly preserves component integrity, maximizing recovery rates.

tiers.name: Molecular Recovery Systems
tiers.description: Molecular-level recovery systems extract materials at the atomic scale.

tiers.name: Nano-scale Material Separation
tiers.description: Nanoscale separation techniques isolate pure materials from complex mixtures.

tiers.name: Quantum State Preservation
tiers.description: Quantum state preservation maintains material properties during disassembly.

tiers.name: Entropy-Reversed Material Reconstruction
tiers.description: Entropy reversal allows materials to be restored to their original state.

tiers.name: Perfect State Recovery Arrays
tiers.description: Perfect state recovery achieves 100% material recovery with zero loss.

tiers.name: Temporal Reversion Salvage
tiers.description: Time reversal enables materials to be recovered from before they were used.

tiers.name: Heisenberg Energy Mass Compensator
tiers.description: Heisenberg uncertainty manipulation allows perfect energy-mass conversion during recovery.

tiers.name: Anti-Entropic Reversibility
tiers.description: Anti-entropic processes enable materials to be recovered in better condition than when created.

trees.name: Robotic Systems
trees.description: Research improving robotic manipulation capabilities increases mining and building rates.

tiers.name: Manipulator Arms
tiers.description: Basic robotic arms provide multi-axis manipulation for construction and mining operations.

tiers.name: End-Effectors
tiers.description: Specialized end effectors enable precise handling of different materials and components.

tiers.name: Modular Tool Heads
tiers.description: Interchangeable tool heads allow rapid adaptation to different tasks.

tiers.name: Deformable Surface Controllers
tiers.description: Deformable manipulators can adapt their shape to handle irregular objects.

tiers.name: Metal-Liquid Interface Manipulators
tiers.description: Specialized manipulators handle materials in both solid and liquid states.

tiers.name: Magnetic Vacuum Arrays
tiers.description: Magnetic field arrays enable contactless manipulation of ferromagnetic materials.

tiers.name: Zero-Point Field Disruptors
tiers.description: Zero-point energy manipulation allows direct matter manipulation at the quantum level.

tiers.name: Quantum Manipulation Arrays
tiers.description: Quantum entanglement enables manipulation of objects without physical contact.

tiers.name: Spacetime Manipulation Arms
tiers.description: Direct spacetime manipulation allows objects to be moved by warping space itself.

tiers.name: Grey Goo
tiers.description: Self-replicating nanomachines can disassemble and reassemble matter at will, achieving perfect manipulation.

trees.name: Thrust Systems
trees.description: Research tree for Thrust Systems

tiers.name: Cold Gas Thrusters
tiers.description: Simple compressed gas thrusters provide reliable attitude control and small delta-V maneuvers.

tiers.name: Chemical Rockets
tiers.description: Chemical rockets offer high thrust for rapid orbital insertion and major maneuvers.

tiers.name: Ion Thrusters
tiers.description: Ion thrusters provide high efficiency for long-duration, low-thrust missions.

tiers.name: Hall Effect Thrusters
tiers.description: Hall effect thrusters combine high efficiency with moderate thrust for versatile operations.

tiers.name: Nuclear Thermal Thrusters
tiers.description: Nuclear thermal systems use reactor heat to accelerate propellant, providing high thrust.

tiers.name: Fusion Thrusters
tiers.description: Fusion-powered thrusters offer both high thrust and high efficiency for rapid interplanetary travel.

tiers.name: Antimatter Thrusters
tiers.description: Antimatter annihilation provides maximum possible thrust-to-mass ratios.

tiers.name: Plasma Magnet Thrusters
tiers.description: Plasma magnet systems use magnetic fields to accelerate charged particles without electrodes.

tiers.name: Field Propulsion Systems
tiers.description: Field propulsion manipulates spacetime to provide reactionless thrust.

tiers.name: Spacetime Thrusters
tiers.description: Direct spacetime manipulation enables propulsion without expelling any propellant or energy.

trees.name: Energy Collection Efficiency
trees.description: Research improving solar energy collection, conversion efficiency, and energy storage systems.

tiers.name: Photovoltaic Cell Optimization
tiers.description: Optimized photovoltaic cells improve solar energy conversion efficiency and power output.

tiers.name: Multi-Junction Solar Cells
tiers.description: Multi-junction cells capture energy across multiple wavelengths, dramatically increasing efficiency.

tiers.name: Concentrated Solar Optics
tiers.description: Optical concentrators focus sunlight onto high-efficiency cells, maximizing power density.

tiers.name: Thermal Energy Storage
tiers.description: Thermal storage systems capture excess solar energy for use during periods of low sunlight.

tiers.name: Quantum Dot Solar Arrays
tiers.description: Quantum dot technology enables near-perfect photon absorption across the entire solar spectrum.

tiers.name: Orbital Solar Swarm Arrays
tiers.description: Massive orbital arrays capture solar energy from multiple angles, maximizing collection rates.

tiers.name: Stirling Engine Conversion Arrays
tiers.description: Stirling engines convert thermal energy to electricity with exceptional efficiency.

tiers.name: Thermophotovoltaic Conversion
tiers.description: Thermophotovoltaic cells convert thermal radiation directly to electricity at high temperatures.

tiers.name: Zero-Point Energy Harvesters
tiers.description: Zero-point energy extraction taps into quantum vacuum fluctuations for unlimited power.

tiers.name: Dark Energy Tapping Systems
tiers.description: Direct extraction of dark energy from spacetime provides infinite energy sources.

trees.name: Energy Conversion
trees.description: Research tree for Energy Conversion

tiers.name: Basic Generators
tiers.description: Simple generators convert mechanical energy to electrical power for basic operations.

tiers.name: Turbine Generators
tiers.description: High-speed turbines efficiently convert thermal or kinetic energy to electricity.

tiers.name: Thermoelectric Generators
tiers.description: Thermoelectric materials convert heat directly to electricity without moving parts.

tiers.name: Thermophotovoltaic Cells
tiers.description: Thermophotovoltaic cells convert thermal radiation to electricity with high efficiency.

tiers.name: Direct Conversion Cells
tiers.description: Direct energy conversion eliminates intermediate steps, maximizing efficiency.

tiers.name: Quantum Converters
tiers.description: Quantum effects enable energy conversion at the fundamental physical limits.

tiers.name: Zero-Point Converters
tiers.description: Zero-point energy converters extract power from quantum vacuum fluctuations.

tiers.name: Vacuum Energy Converters
tiers.description: Vacuum energy extraction provides unlimited power from empty space.

tiers.name: Spacetime Converters
tiers.description: Spacetime curvature manipulation directly generates electrical energy.

tiers.name: Perfect Conversion Systems
tiers.description: Perfect conversion systems achieve 100% efficiency with zero energy loss.

trees.name: Energy Storage & Accumulators
trees.description: Research improving energy storage capacity and efficiency.

tiers.name: Battery Banks
tiers.description: Chemical batteries provide reliable energy storage for short to medium duration needs.

tiers.name: Supercapacitor Arrays
tiers.description: Supercapacitors offer rapid charge-discharge cycles with high power density.

tiers.name: Molten Salt Thermal Storage
tiers.description: Molten salt systems store thermal energy for extended periods with minimal loss.

tiers.name: Compressed Air Energy Storage
tiers.description: Compressed air systems provide large-scale energy storage with high capacity.

tiers.name: Flywheel Energy Storage
tiers.description: High-speed flywheels store kinetic energy with exceptional efficiency.

tiers.name: Superconducting Magnetic Storage
tiers.description: Superconducting magnetic systems store energy indefinitely with zero loss.

tiers.name: Quantum Battery Arrays
tiers.description: Quantum batteries store energy in superposition states, enabling infinite capacity.

tiers.name: Vacuum Energy Accumulators
tiers.description: Vacuum energy storage taps into quantum fluctuations for unlimited capacity.

tiers.name: Negative Temperature Cold Pump
tiers.description: Negative temperature systems store energy in inverted thermodynamic states.

tiers.name: Pocket Dimension Batteries
tiers.description: Pocket dimensions provide infinite energy storage capacity in zero physical space.

trees.name: Energy Transport Beams
trees.description: Research enabling wireless energy transmission across vast distances.

tiers.name: Microwave Power Beams
tiers.description: Microwave beams transmit power wirelessly over long distances with minimal loss.

tiers.name: Laser Power Beams
tiers.description: Focused laser beams enable precise power transmission with high efficiency.

tiers.name: Optical Resonance Beams
tiers.description: Resonant optical systems minimize transmission losses through interference effects.

tiers.name: Plasma Conduit Beams
tiers.description: Plasma conduits transmit power through ionized channels with minimal resistance.

tiers.name: Quantum Entangled Power Transmission
tiers.description: Quantum entanglement enables instantaneous power transfer across any distance.

tiers.name: Coherent X-Ray Laser Transfer
tiers.description: Coherent X-ray lasers transmit massive power with perfect efficiency.

tiers.name: Scalar Field Translocator
tiers.description: Scalar field manipulation enables power transmission through higher dimensions.

tiers.name: Tachyon Ray
tiers.description: Tachyonic particles transmit power faster than light, enabling instant transfer.

tiers.name: Zero-Mode Vacuum Pump
tiers.description: Zero-mode vacuum pumps extract and transmit energy directly from spacetime.

tiers.name: Anti-Entropic Time Field
tiers.description: Anti-entropic fields reverse time to transmit power from the future to the present.

trees.name: Heat Pump Systems
trees.description: Research tree for Heat Pump Systems

tiers.name: Basic Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Basic heat pumps transfer thermal energy from cold to hot regions using mechanical work.

tiers.name: Vapor Compression Systems
tiers.description: Vapor compression cycles efficiently move heat using phase-change fluids.

tiers.name: Absorption Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Absorption systems use chemical reactions to transfer heat without mechanical compressors.

tiers.name: Thermoelectric Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Thermoelectric devices pump heat using electrical current with no moving parts.

tiers.name: Magnetic Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Magnetic refrigeration systems use magnetic fields to pump heat efficiently.

tiers.name: Quantum Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Quantum effects enable heat pumping at the fundamental thermodynamic limits.

tiers.name: Vacuum Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Vacuum energy manipulation allows heat transfer without temperature gradients.

tiers.name: Spacetime Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Spacetime curvature manipulation directly transfers thermal energy.

tiers.name: Zero-Point Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Zero-point energy extraction enables heat pumping without energy input.

tiers.name: Perfect Heat Transfer
tiers.description: Perfect heat transfer systems achieve infinite efficiency with zero energy cost.

trees.name: Thermal Management
trees.description: Research tree for Thermal Management

tiers.name: Basic Radiators
tiers.description: Simple radiators dissipate waste heat through thermal radiation into space.

tiers.name: Heat Pipes
tiers.description: Heat pipes efficiently transfer heat using phase-change fluid circulation.

tiers.name: Loop Heat Pipes
tiers.description: Loop heat pipes provide passive heat transport over long distances.

tiers.name: Vapor Chambers
tiers.description: Vapor chambers spread heat uniformly across large surface areas.

tiers.name: Microchannel Coolers
tiers.description: Microchannel systems maximize heat transfer surface area for compact cooling.

tiers.name: Phase Change Materials
tiers.description: Phase change materials absorb large amounts of heat during transitions.

tiers.name: Thermoelectric Coolers
tiers.description: Thermoelectric devices provide active cooling without moving parts.

tiers.name: Quantum Heat Pumps
tiers.description: Quantum effects enable heat rejection at the fundamental physical limits.

tiers.name: Negative Thermal Mass Systems
tiers.description: Negative thermal mass systems absorb heat without increasing temperature.

tiers.name: Perfect Heat Rejection
tiers.description: Perfect heat rejection systems eliminate waste heat with zero energy cost.
